name: In re SUBPOENA NO. 22. Appeal of A.B.
docket_number: Petition No. 235 Middle District Allocatur Docket 1998

parties: In re SUBPOENA NO. 22. Appeal of A.B.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 6th day of October, 1998, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED limited to the issue of whether the psychotherapist-client privilege prohibits disclosure of confidential communications following the client’s death.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
718 A.2d 1245
In re SUBPOENA NO. 22. Appeal of A.B.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 6, 1998.
